title: Bug 37021 - Source path displayed incorrectly in declare warning on binary files
description: Bug 37021 - Source path displayed incorrectly in declare warning on binary files [java|aj]. The problem can be observed by running the code in tests/new/binaryWarnings/. However, please note that these tests may return false positives due to limitations in filename checking. In AJDT, if the filename does not make sense, it may be omitted.
OB: When targeting .class files from injars, the source path in declare warning messages is displayed as 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main'. There are also cases where the filenames do not appear at all, but these tests do not reproduce that problem.
EB: In declare warning messages when targeting .class files from injars, the source path should be displayed as 'app/Main' instead of 'app.Main.class'.
